member.name: T:API.Controllers.CamerasController
member.summary: Camera controller

member.summary: Get all available cameras

member.summary: Get list of saved cameras
member.returns: A .txt file with all cameraIps registered in persistent storage

member.summary: Reload available cameras from list

member.summary: Upload .txt file with list of cameraIps. Check Cameras/Saved
member.param: A .txt file with a list of cameraIps

member.name: M:API.Controllers.CamerasController.Remove(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Remove camera from list

member.name: T:API.Controllers.ExperimentController
member.summary: Experiment controller

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ExperimentController.StartExperimentWithImages(System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Int32)
member.summary: Start an experiment that logs and captures Stereo and Validation images
member.param: Interval is in MS and must be >= 100

member.summary: Start an experiment that only captures logs

member.summary: Stop an ongoing experiment

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ExperimentController.Status(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get information about the current experiment

member.summary: Download Zip folder containing specific experiment data. Use /ExperimentData to get names

member.name: T:API.Controllers.MonitoringController
member.summary: Controller for the monitoring service

member.name: M:API.Controllers.MonitoringController.Zones(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get data from all zones on registered cameras
